[event]
# Teleport to Elder's House
type=teleport
location=15,13,1,1
intermap=laurelia.txt,69,51
requires_status=ghostupgrade

[event]
# Teleport to Basement7
type=teleport
location=11,31,2,1
intermap=basement7.txt,27,1

[event]
# Spawn Daphne's Shadow
type=run_once
location=7,16,1,1
hotspot=location
msg=You must defeat your shadow!
requires_not=ghostupgrade
spawn=dshadow,14,25
tooltip=Fountain

[npc]
# Strange Ghost
type=basementghost
location=11,14,1,1
